title: Entering the Forest of Shadows
description:
You walked into the forest of shadows. You are looking for the herb for the witch to cure your sick sibling.

A small fairy flies near you and offers to help guide you through the forest

areaChoices.output: North - Continue further on the path into the woods.
areaChoices.choiceDescription: You moved further North into the woods, feeling a sense of dread as your footsteps echo off the trees surrounding you.

areaChoices.output: South - The opening of the woods where you enetered. Returning without the herbs will be admitting to being a failure.
areaChoices.choiceDescription: You moved South, running away from the woods and likely leaving your sister to die. This decision will weigh heavily on you.
You spend a minute looking around and find nothing

title: Thickets of Trees in the Forest of Shadows
description: You trek further into the dark woods, hoping you can find the herb quickly. Your sibling does not have much time left. You see something shimmering on the ground in front of you

areaChoices.output: North - Continue further on the path into the woods.
areaChoices.choiceDescription: Praying that the herb you need is not too far away, you continue on the dark forested path.

areaChoices.output: South - The trail you just used is behind you.
areaChoices.choiceDescription: Thinking you may have missed something, you decide to turn around.

areaChoices.output: Search - Examine the shimmering item on the ground
areaChoices.choiceDescription: You spend a minute looking around and find a small dagger.

title: Fairy Enclave in the Forest of Shadows
description: You do not know what area of the forest you have made it to and it puts you slightly on ease how at ease you have become as soon as you stepped foot here

areaChoices.choiceDescription: You end up falling asleep due to the lulling nature of the feeling in this area.

areaChoices.output: South - You no longer see a way back from where you came.

areaChoices.choiceDescription: You spend a minute looking around and find an herb that you believe might be the one you need for your sister.
